Not your prosperity.
 
 Not my prosperity.
 
 Just their very own, personal and very big prosperity. Like in billions of dollars of prosperity at your expense and my expense.
 
 Americans for Prosperity, founded by the Koch brothers of Wichita, Kansas, Charles and David, each worth about $19 billion.
